name: THE RASCAL ISSUE ONE
description:
The first issue of the zine, containing nostalgia, Urban farming, Toilet reviews and more.

12 page whimsical magazine based in Edinburgh, printed in high quality black and white. 

Whimsy, nonsense and satire abounds in cyberspace!

The Edinburgh Rascal is a joke-based-pseudo-satire-wh...imsy-oriented magazine based at the University of (you guessed it) Edinburgh. We make issues of our magazine as often as we can; roughly once a month in term time. This is our wonderful website.

Read hilarious stories about hilarious (and not so hilarious) things. It’s vaguely satirical. It’s a pack of hyperbolic scandal, lies and unsubstantiated rumour. It’ll make you laugh, it’ll make you cry, it touches on the whole pallet of human emotion. What we haven’t got you don’t need.

If this tickles your fancy, like a ticklish pigeon fancier in a farm for fancy pigeons, then please explore our website, read our magazine, LAUGH. If you want to you can even drop us an email at theedinburghrascal@gmail.com. We proverbially don’t bite.

JOIN US. SUBMIT. (As in we’d love to publish stuff from you, send us submissions. We’d love to have new members; email about getting involved!)

name: THE RASCAL ISSUE TWO
description:

name: THE RASCAL ISSUE THREE
description:

name: THE RASCAL ISSUE FOUR
description:
Obama and Osama memorial crockery, Summertime, HRH Sir Prince Charles' sex tips, Jeff Tipton, The Meadows, Andrew Lansley comeback rap, bidding farewell to a dear friend, Nick Clegg's crying playlist, Will Self, Tram passes and more!
